description.narrative: National WASH Programme Management Unit have strengthened capacity to lead and coordinate WASH sector and ensure that key governance functions for the WASH sector are in place, including during emergencies., which contributes to Evaluation And Research, Sanitation, Water. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: New Element

sector.narrative: WASH - Enabling environment (policies/strategies, coordination, regulation, financing, planning-monitoring-review, sector capacity development and professionalization)
Water sector policy and administrative management

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: National WASH Programme Management Unit have strengthened capacity to lead and coordinate WASH sector and ensure that key governance functions for the WASH sector are in place, including during emergencies.

description.narrative: UNICEF established the first ever WASH sector MIS for Papua New Guinea, developed capacity of CSO and government functionaries on mWater (web-based platform used for WASH MIS) and drafted ODF definition for PNG. The UNICEF led WASH planning process informed government plans for the scaling up of the district WASH planning for PNG going from four districts to eight districts in 2019 with further expansion planned. The WASH PMU constituted under the Department of National Planning and Monitoring (DNPM) continues to coordinate the WASH sector in the country. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:17/01/2020

title.narrative: National standards for WASH in schools with a disability component available

actual.value: 2019:Initiating. The WiNS policy was endorsed and launched by National Department of Education

title.narrative: Existence of functioning service delivery arrangement for water, sanitation and hygiene

actual.value: 2020:SDA developed and shared with DNPM; four DDAs are implementing WASH Plans.

title.narrative: Existence of functioning sector coordination mechanism for water, sanitation and hygiene

actual.value: 2020:The NWSHA establishment is still awaiting Govt approval.
